org.mule.modules.watsonalchemylanguage.model

Class EntitiesRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mule.modules.watsonalchemylanguage.model.EntitiesRequest

  • public class EntitiesRequest
extends Object
    Class with all the options for the entities operation.
    Author:
    Admios

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EntitiesRequest() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Integer getCoreference()
      Flag value(0-1) used to the treatment of coreferences as separate entities (coreferences are resolved into detected default entities)
      String getCquery()
      A visual constraints query to apply to the web page.
      Integer getDisambiguate()
      Flag value(0-1) used to hide entity disambiguation information in the response
      Integer getKnowledgeGraph()
      Flag value(0-1) used to include knowledge graph information in the results.
      Integer getLinkedData()
      Flag value(0-1) used to hide Linked Data content links in the response
      Integer getMaxRetrieve()
      Maximum number of entities to return (default 50)
      Integer getQuotations()
      Flag value(0-1) used to include quotations that are linked to detected entities
      Integer getSentiment()
      Flag value(0-1) used to analyze the sentiment towards each detected entity.
      Boolean getShowSourceText()
      Flag value(0-1) to verify the inclusion of the source text in the response
      String getSource()
      Text or URL to process
      String getSourceText()
      This value describes how to obtain the source text from the web page
      Integer getStructuredEntities()
      Flag value(0-1) used to ignore or show structured entities, such as Quantity, EmailAddress, TwitterHandle, Hashtag, and IPAddress
      String getXpath()
      An XPath query to apply to the web page.

      General Setter for coreference parameter

      • getMaxRetrieve

        public Integer getMaxRetrieve()
        Maximum number of entities to return (default 50)
        Returns:
        Value of the maxRetrieve attribute

      • getCoreference

        public Integer getCoreference()
        Flag value(0-1) used to the treatment of coreferences as separate entities (coreferences are resolved into detected default entities)
        Returns:
        Value of the coreference attribute

      • getDisambiguate

        public Integer getDisambiguate()
        Flag value(0-1) used to hide entity disambiguation information in the response
        Returns:
        Value of the disambiguate attribute

      • getKnowledgeGraph

        public Integer getKnowledgeGraph()
        Flag value(0-1) used to include knowledge graph information in the results. This incurs an additional transaction charge
        Returns:
        Value of the knowledgeGraph attribute

      • getLinkedData

        public Integer getLinkedData()
        Flag value(0-1) used to hide Linked Data content links in the response
        Returns:
        Value of the linkedData attribute

      • getQuotations

        public Integer getQuotations()
        Flag value(0-1) used to include quotations that are linked to detected entities
        Returns:
        Value of the quotations attribute

      • getSentiment

        public Integer getSentiment()
        Flag value(0-1) used to analyze the sentiment towards each detected entity. This incurs an additional transaction charge
        Returns:
        Value of the sentiment attribute

      • getShowSourceText

        public Boolean getShowSourceText()
        Flag value(0-1) to verify the inclusion of the source text in the response
        Returns:
        Value of the showSourceText attribute

      • getStructuredEntities

        public Integer getStructuredEntities()
        Flag value(0-1) used to ignore or show structured entities, such as Quantity, EmailAddress, TwitterHandle, Hashtag, and IPAddress
        Returns:
        Value of the structuredEntities attribute

      • getCquery

        public String getCquery()
        A visual constraints query to apply to the web page. Required when sourceText is set to cquery
        Returns:
        Value of the cquery attribute

      • getXpath

        public String getXpath()
        An XPath query to apply to the web page. Required when sourceText is set to one of the XPath values
        Returns:
        Value of the xpath attribute

      • getSourceText

        public String getSourceText()
        This value describes how to obtain the source text from the web page
        Returns:
        Value of the sourceText attribute
